name: iriusrisk-cli
description: AI-powered threat modeling integration for IriusRisk. Enables AI assistants to analyze codebases, create threat models, review security threats, implement countermeasures, and generate compliance reports.

functions.name: initialize_iriusrisk_workflow
functions.description: Get critical usage instructions for AI assistants. Must be called first before using other tools.

functions.name: get_cli_version
functions.description: Get the current version of IriusRisk CLI.

functions.name: sync
functions.description: Synchronize with IriusRisk to pull down components, trust zones, and project data.

parameters.name: project_path
parameters.description: Full path to the project directory

functions.name: import_otm
functions.description: Import an OTM (Open Threat Model) file to create or update a project in IriusRisk.

parameters.name: otm_file_path
parameters.description: Path to the OTM file to import

functions.name: project_status
functions.description: Check the status of a project in IriusRisk.

functions.name: threats_and_countermeasures
functions.description: Get instructions for reading and exploring threats and countermeasures data.

functions.name: show_diagram
functions.description: Download and display the project threat model diagram as a PNG image.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Image size: ORIGINAL, PREVIEW, or THUMBNAIL

functions.name: analyze_source_material
functions.description: Get instructions for analyzing mixed source repositories (code, infrastructure, policies, documentation).

functions.name: create_threat_model
functions.description: Get step-by-step instructions for creating an IriusRisk threat model.

functions.name: track_threat_update
functions.description: Track a threat status update for later synchronization with IriusRisk.

parameters.name: threat_id
parameters.description: UUID of the threat (from threats.json 'id' field)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: New status: accept, mitigate, expose, partly-mitigate, hidden

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Explanation of why the status is being changed

functions.name: track_countermeasure_update
functions.description: Track a countermeasure status update for later synchronization with IriusRisk.

parameters.name: countermeasure_id
parameters.description: UUID of the countermeasure (from countermeasures.json 'id' field)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: New status: required, recommended, implemented, rejected, not-applicable

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description: Explanation of why the status is being changed

functions.name: create_countermeasure_issue
functions.description: Track an issue creation request for a countermeasure in the issue tracker.

functions.name: get_pending_updates
functions.description: Get all pending threat and countermeasure updates that haven't been synced yet.

functions.name: clear_updates
functions.description: Clear all tracked updates (both pending and applied).

functions.name: list_standards
functions.description: List available compliance standards for reports (OWASP Top 10, PCI DSS, NIST, ISO, etc).

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID (uses current project if not specified)

functions.name: generate_report
functions.description: Generate and download an IriusRisk report (countermeasure, threat, compliance, risk-summary).

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format: pdf, html, xlsx, csv, xls

parameters.name: output_path
parameters.description: Where to save the report file

parameters.name: standard
parameters.description: Standard reference ID for compliance reports

functions.name: architecture_and_design_review
functions.description: Get guidance for architecture and design reviews with optional threat modeling.

functions.name: security_development_advisor
functions.description: Get security guidance and recommendations for development work.

functions.name: list_project_versions
functions.description: List all version snapshots for a project.

functions.name: create_project_version
functions.description: Create a new version snapshot of a project.
